creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: five children in a row in LLQ, with smallest child at center, riding hobby horses; children wear brightly-colored tunics and pants; tree at rights; one line of text at left edge, ULC; red oval seal below lines of text; large square red seal, LRC
title: Children riding hobby horses
